text: Rommel's Treasure (Italian: Il tesoro di Rommel) is a 1955 Italian-American drama film directed by Romolo Marcellini and starring Dawn Addams, Paul Hubschmid and Isa Miranda.Parish p.276 In post-war Cairo a variety of different people seek a stash of valuables and secret documents left behind by Erwin Rommel during the North African Campaign. ==Cast== * Dawn Addams as Sofia * Paul Hubschmid as von Brunner * Isa Miranda as Mrs. Fischer * Bruce Cabot as Welles * Andrea Checchi as Krikorian * Wolfgang Lukschy as Petersen * Fanfulla as Muezir * John Stacy * Vittorio Massimo as Krikorian * Cristina Pall * Taheya Cariocca == References == == Bibliography == * Parish, Robert. Film Actors Guide. Scarecrow Press, 1977. == External links == * Category:1955 drama films Category:Italian drama films Category:1955 films Category:American films Category:Italian films Category:Italian-language films Category:Films directed by Romolo Marcellini Category:Films scored by Carlo Rustichelli Category:Films set in Cairo Category:Treasure hunt films Category:Underwater action films
title: Rommel's Treasure
